text: In the Edit Modules panel at page level, is it possible to create groups /labels similar to "body modules" to define groups of modules that make up sections of the page?  (does this question make sense? I was having trouble trying to define what I'm asking)

That's pretty close to what I'm looking for, but won't quite work for my situation.  I've got too much regular html mixed in with modules I would like to group in my template.  I guess what I'm looking for would be a module parameter along the lines of `module_group="hero banner modules"`
